price: ߓߊ߬ ߌ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߙߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߊ߬ߙߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏߘߌ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߜߟߌߦߊߣߍ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߖߎ߬ߟߎ ( ߛߙߊ߬ߞߏ ) ߓߟߏ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
